issue.title: [Gandiva][C++] Add Mask_Hash function
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15661](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15661). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Returns a hashed value based on str. The hash is consistent and can be used to join masked values together across tables.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15661?focusedCommentId=17557435) by Johnnathan Rodrigo Pego de Almeida (johnnathanalmeida):*
I'm closing this ticket because the Mask_Hash function won't implementation in Gandiva side anymore.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15661?focusedCommentId=17557436) by Johnnathan Rodrigo Pego de Almeida (johnnathanalmeida):*
I'm closing this ticket because the Mask_Hash function won't implementation in Gandiva side anymore.

I implemented all the functions required internally by Mask_Hash on the Gandiva side, but Mask_Hash will only be implemented on the Dremio side.
